0: The place is terribly out of date kind of dingy and had a bad smell from lobby to the room
Rooms are not the best in terms of size and also amenities
Our room was right by the elevator and very noisy in the morning
The doors slammed shut and I could hear people talking in the hall
Loud noisy kids running up and down the halls all night and slamming doors
That being said our room as well as the hallway on the 5th floor especially the hallway along with the whole hotel smells horribly of stale cigarette smoke
could not hear people in the halls or in other rooms
The walls of the room were very dirty the décor of the whole facility is outdated and the carpet in my room was clearly patched
We did not use the fitness center or any other amenities
The stairwells leading to the lobby were locked so you were forced to the elevators to get to lobby without walking outside
1: Here they greeted us in the halls wishing us a good day
The general manager was a pleasure to meet and the facilities exceeded our expectations
The hotel was located very close to the wedding reception venue
I do n’t have any complaints with this hotel staff was all friendly rooms and amenities were very nice clean
The lobby and rooms are clean
The rooms are clean and so is the lobby eating area
The hotel was very clean and had nice amenities
Fast usable WiFi that allowed me to get some online work done in both the room and in the lobby
Came back to hotel for a fun swim and some time with friends in the very comfortable and cool lobby
